text: I'm the shunned I'm the founder and CEO
of hello English which is a platform
that allows people to learn English from

the world we started back in 2012 as the
platform that allowed people to learn
different foreign languages we quickly
realized that a bigger opportunity lie
in the English market space we sort of
rebranded we launched ourselves as hello
English as the go-to place for people to
learn English fast forward today we are
a platform with over 50 million or 5
crore learners across the world EWS was
the natural choice for us to go to
because it abstracted the law of the
details and a lot of hard work from the
server side of things the sort of
maintaining all of that from us it
allowed us a very easy scalability it
provided a very robust reliability and
security that a lot of our customers
sort of demanded from us including a lot
of our enterprise clients who we serve
today scalability is one factor that AWS
has always helped us we've not had a
single server that we had to put up in
optimizes or you know any piece of code
that's hosted physically with us right
everything's thanks to AWS has been
sitting comfortably on the cloud has
been scaling up as the need be with AWS
we believe that you know we always get
that advantage because there's so much
there's so many new micro services new
stacks that become available as a part

that's become super easy for us to pilot

figure out whether that sort of you know
changes any metric in our a be tests and
if it does then sort of it becoming a
